If you plant this root onto a statue,
it will soon start moving as if it were alive.

when human history crosses a stream of Mana.
It can be said that it is the ingredient for materializing Heroic Spirits.

skills.name: Eternal Arms Mastery A+
skills.detail: Increase your C. Star Gather Rate (3 turns)

skills.name: Mana Burst (Lightning) A
skills.detail: Increase Buster Card effectiveness (1 turn) & apply Evade (1 turn) for yourself

skills.name: Mystic Slayer A
skills.detail: Apply Special Attack [Demonic] (3 turns) & Special Attack [Servants with Heaven or Earth attributes (except Pseudo-Servants and Demi-Servants)] (3 turns) for yourself

buffs.name: STR Up vs. Heaven/Earth Servant
buffs.detail: Increase damage dealt against [Servants with Heaven or Earth powers (excluding Pseudo-Servants and Demi-Servants)]

noblePhantasms.name: Vengeful Lightning of the Ox-King
noblePhantasms.detail: Increase your C. Star Drop Rate (1 turn) <effect increases with Overcharge> + deal heavy damage to all enemies

comments.comment:
A historical figure from the 10th-11th centuries.
As founder of the Settsu branch of the Genji family, she contributed to the prosperity of the Seiwa Genji family.
Crowned the strongest Mystic Slayer of the Heian period, she has dispatched many demons, such as Shuten-Douji of Mt. Ooe, the Giant Spider of Kyoto, and the Ox-Demon of Sensoji.
Of course, this figure was historically a man. However, the secret of her birth is the reason for the gender change.
She leads four retainers: Watanabe-no-Tsuna, Sakata Kintoki, Urabe-no-Suetake, and Usui Sadamitsu.

Height/Weight: 175cm, ??kg
Origin: History, "Otogizoushi," "Tale of Ushi Gozen."
Region: Japan
Alignment: Chaotic-Good
Gender: Female
She's a ruthless warrior yet a caring and gentle beauty, the perfect personification of maternal love.
"Oh my, what have I done wrong as a mother?"

『Vengeful Lightning of the Ox-King』
Rank: B++
NP Type: Anti-Army
Range: 1-100　Maximum Targets: 200

Gooushourai, Tenmou Kaikai.
She summons the Ox (or Ox Demon) servants of Gozu-Tenno, the source of her twisted origin and demonic power, and crushes the enemy forces with their strength.
The four weapons that manifest with lightning symbolize the souls of her four retainers.

A beautiful, elegant, and mature woman.
Also an honest professional soldier.
She cries a lot, especially when she gets worried about Kintoki.
She seems to be a peaceful person, but since she's not fully human and has a divine heritage, she tends to be more objective and cares about the greater good.
On the other hand, she devotes herself to anyone she loves as the personification of maternal love. To her, a lover equals her own son, and she would do anything for her son. However, she doesn't realize her own twisted view.

According to the traditional Japanese play "The Tale of Ushi Gozen"...

A child conceived by the Ox-King
Gozu-Tenno was born into the household of Minamoto-no-Mitsunaka.
This child, cursed as the offspring of an oni, was sent to a temple to be raised in secret.

At the age of 15, the cursed child took the name "Ushi Gozen" and created a demonic territory in Suzunomori, Shinagawa.
The samurai who went forth to eliminate this menace was none other than the elder child of Minamoto-no-Mitsunaka,
Minamoto-no-Raikou, alongside the Four Heavenly Kings.

"Ushi Gozen" was the reincarnation of Gozu-Tenno, and Gozu-Tenno was the reincarnation of Indra.

...Just who was Ushi Gozen?
And what was the outcome of that fated battle?
Only Minamoto-no-Raikou and Sakata Kintoki know the answer.

Madness Enhancement: EX
A skill that increases physical abilities in exchange for the user's sanity.
In Raikou's case, she retains her sanity and stays as an intelligent being. However, as her mind is being corrupted by a mix of oni blood and excessive maternal love, her moral values are corrupted as well.
(She will eliminate anything and everything for the sake of her love, and protect them obsessively.) 
She speaks of love, yet she will ignore all moral values, and do anything in the name of love. In other words, she's mentally ill.
Not many people can perceive her broken side, which separates her from other Berserkers.
Basically, it's impossible to ask her to change her mind.

For Raikou, her Master is a single ray of light into the darkness of her heart.
Other than Kintoki, her Master is the only other person who accepted her demonic self and formed a contract with her.
For that very reason, she is extremely affectionate towards her Master.
However, as she's very possessive, she will cry if ignored, and question her Master with a scary look if cheated on.
"Maternal love" sounds good, but too much of it will become "a total control over a child's life, taking away their freedom and their future."
Although Raikou's love has reached the realm of madness, due to her high intellect and rationality, her madness is not widely known (to those around her, and to herself).

voiceLines.name: Birthday
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hehe, this way please, Master.
I hear birthdays are meant to be celebrated with family. Now then, feel free to see me as your mother for this special day.

voiceLines.name: During an Event
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hm? It appears a festival might be underway.
Sounds fun. Let's go!

voiceLines.name: Conversation 1
voiceLines.subtitle: It is said that children are outdoor creatures. Shall we go somewhere? I will go with you.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Master... Master... Oh yes, this is nice indeed.
It is quite refreshing to work with someone not as a general, but simply as a woman.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Just like how I was with my Four Heavenly Kings... I wish to deepen my bond with you, and to be able to talk about anything with you... Would that trouble you?

voiceLines.name: Likes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What do I like? Kintsuba cakes, perhaps.
What? Not food? S-Sorry! ...Oh my, how embarrassing...

voiceLines.name: Dislikes
voiceLines.subtitle:
What do I hate?
Do you even need to ask? There is really only one thing. Irksome pests that get close to the ones I love.

voiceLines.name: About the Holy Grail
voiceLines.subtitle: What I would wish for with the Holy Grail...? I suppose a peaceful world where every child knows their mother's love.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
I am a Berserker... I feared this class would be thought of as man-eating fiends...
But I am pleased that you still desire to work with me. Leave the battlefield to me, Master.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
Though my place may be on the battlefield, I do enjoy talking here with you like this.
I take no enjoyment in war. One loses their spirit as they crush their enemies like bugs.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes, uhm... We have gotten to know each other a bit better, so do you think I could... call you not by Master, but... my dear?

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hehe. This way, please. If you are tired, my lap is yours. Call me "Minamoto-no-lap pillow."
Does that feel nice? Now then, Master. I am a possessive woman. I would hate to see you doing this with anyone else.

voiceLines.name: Bond Level 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
I swear to you, Master. I will love you as my own child.
So please, do not betray your dear mother... I can't quite say what I would do if you did...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh Kintoki, are you still causing trouble like that? H-Hey, where are you going?!
I am merely looking out for you, my child... You're so cruel, I could cry...

voiceLines.name: Conversation 5
voiceLines.subtitle:
I sense a troublesome bug... Perhaps that ragged oni girl over there.
Oh, do not fret. When I crush her, neither you nor Kintoki will have to watch.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 6
voiceLines.subtitle:
I hear that there is a yellow troublesome pest lurking around Master and Kintoki...
It couldn't be who I think it is, could it?

voiceLines.name: Conversation 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Ah, it seems the other me caused you a great deal of trouble...
I'm terribly sorry.
Lady Musashi, please forgive me.

voiceLines.name: Conversation 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Oh, my. A troublesome bug mustn't look this way...mustn't breathe...mustn't exist... If it will not end itself, then I will crush it.
Hm? Thank you? What are you talking about...?
Oh, that was a different me and different you...
Well, that doesn't concern US.
But...well, that is true...
I suppose you did good work back there.

voiceLines.name: Level up
voiceLines.subtitle: I did it! Did you see that, Master? I am in peak condition♪

voiceLines.name: Ascension 2
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 702300_0_G020]Oh my... Is this okay? [id 702300_0_G021]For me... to be like this...

voiceLines.name: Ascension 1
voiceLines.subtitle: [id 702300_0_G030,702300_0_G031]It embarrasses me to say so, but... I am quite happy. [id 702300_0_G032,702300_0_G033]It is a bit juvenile, but I hope you don't mind.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 702300_0_G040]Oh! New battle garments!
[id 702300_0_G041,702300_0_G042]...Hehe. It pleases me that you place hope in me. [id 702300_0_G043]I will continue to improve for you, Master.

voiceLines.name: Ascension 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 702300_0_G050]Oh my... To make me this powerful must mean you indeed care for me...
[id 702300_0_G051]I am most pleased, but I am also most troubled... [id 702300_0_G052]The Ox-Demon that resides within me...
[id 702300_0_G053]Is it really okay for a woman like me to be by your side?

voiceLines.name: Summon
text:
[r]
Although I still have a long way to go,[r]I will be counting on you from now on, okay?
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hello, my dear Mage.
Servant, Saber... Oh? Huh?
I am not a Saber... Oh dear.
Erm...I am Minamoto-no-Raikou.
Although I still have a long way to go,
I will be counting on you from now on, okay?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
Welcome to Onigashima.
Welcome, Master from afar. Do enjoy yourself, yes?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
How is your oni eradication coming along?
Mmm, is that so? Wonderful. Do make sure there is not a single one left standing.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 3
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
Hmm? What is the best way to eradicate oni?
Why, it's simple. Stay focused and spare them no mercy to the end.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 4
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 4
voiceLines.subtitle:
Messages from the battlefield are crucial.
You would do best to review them.
I believe they call it "In Formation"? Something like that. It's all very useful.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 5
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 5
voiceLines.subtitle: My my, look at you all bloodied. You sure are a troublemaker... I just can't leave you alone, can I? Hehe.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 6
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 6
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes, yes, congratulations once again. Did you forget something in the treasure room?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 7
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 7
voiceLines.subtitle:
Did you enjoy taking down those oni?
The riches you gained in battle are yours by right. So make sure you do not miss even a single coin, yes?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 8
voiceLines.overwriteName: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima 8
voiceLines.subtitle:
Yes, Onigashima has fallen...
But I will remain here for a while, so do make sure you don't forget any exchanges or rewards.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 11
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 1
voiceLines.subtitle: This oni extermination is also a glorious battle for the warriors of Genji. Yes... You must not allow a single one to escape.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 12
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Once you start exterminating an oni, do not stop until you finish the job. You have to shove them deep inside a hearth and... Oh, those are not my words... I think it was Tsuna who...

voiceLines.name: About the Event 13
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Listen, foreign Master. You must train every day, study every day, and kill oni every day. Do your best, okay?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 14
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Welcome back. Come, first let me wipe that oni blood off your face.

voiceLines.name: About the Event 15
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Oh my, what is going on? Giving me a combat report? Of course I will listen to you. So, how is the oni extermination going? I assume you're slaughtering every single one of them, right?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 16
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 6
voiceLines.subtitle: This marks the end of our oni extermination. Thank you so much for your hard work, foreign Master. Make sure you don't forget anything, okay?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 17
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 7
voiceLines.subtitle: Everything...feels like an ephemeral dream... Good work out there. I hope I can see you again. Make sure you don't forget to take anything, okay?

voiceLines.name: About the Event 18
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 8
voiceLines.subtitle: Farewell, foreign Master. If it is meant to be, perhaps our paths may cross again in the future... Come, did you forget anything? Did you acquire all the treasures?

voiceLines.name: Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hah!

voiceLines.name: Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: There!

voiceLines.name: Attack 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Does this hurt?

voiceLines.name: Attack 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Ngh!

voiceLines.name: Attack 5
voiceLines.subtitle: Begone!

voiceLines.name: Attack 6
voiceLines.subtitle: Haaaaaaah!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.overwriteName: Extra Attack 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Here I go... Forgive me!

voiceLines.name: Extra Attack
voiceLines.overwriteName: Extra Attack 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Hehe, ahahahaha!

voiceLines.name: Skill 1
voiceLines.subtitle: This is merely an amusement.

voiceLines.name: Skill 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Please witness this power.

voiceLines.name: Skill 3
voiceLines.subtitle: You overestimated yourself, no?

voiceLines.name: Skill 4
voiceLines.subtitle: Do prepare yourself.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 1
voiceLines.subtitle: ...Let the slaughter begin.

voiceLines.name: Battle Start 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I would advise you not to overexert yourself.

voiceLines.name: Victory 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Hmmm... I suppose war always does leave chaos in its wake.

voiceLines.name: Victory 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Did I serve you well? Hehehe, I'm glad to hear that.

voiceLines.name: Damage 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Ungh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 4
voiceLines.overwriteName: Damage 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Ugh!

voiceLines.name: Damage 1
voiceLines.subtitle: You're good...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 1
voiceLines.subtitle: To think that I of all people... I am ashamed...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 2
voiceLines.subtitle: I was careless...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 3
voiceLines.subtitle: To think... I would suffer defeat again...

voiceLines.name: Incapacitated 4
voiceLines.subtitle: This is because... I let my guard down...

voiceLines.name: Command Card 1
voiceLines.subtitle: Understood.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 2
voiceLines.subtitle: Oh my, oh dear.

voiceLines.name: Command Card 3
voiceLines.subtitle: Yes, I am your blade.

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm Card
voiceLines.subtitle: If that is your command. I will become an oni myself!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.overwriteName: Noble Phantasm 1
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 702300_0_B050]Come forth my loyal retainers, my limbs, my armor.
[id 702300_0_B053]Behold my Four Heavenly Kings...
[id 702300_0_B056]Here I go!
[id 702300_0_B057]Ngh!
[id 702300_0_B058]Hyah!
[id 702300_0_B059]Hah!
[id 702300_0_B054,702300_0_B055]Vengeful Lightning of the Ox-King!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.overwriteName: Noble Phantasm 2
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 702300_0_B800,702300_0_B801]Come forth my Four Heavenly Kings! No, the retainers of Gozu Tenno.
[id 702300_0_B804]Take the shape of my memory.
[id 702300_0_B802]Here I go.
[id 702300_0_B803]Vengeful Lightning of the Ox-King!

voiceLines.name: Noble Phantasm
voiceLines.overwriteName: Noble Phantasm 3
voiceLines.subtitle:
[id 702300_0_B810]Vengeful Lightning of the Ox-King...
[id 702300_0_B811]Fufu, fwahahahaha!
[id 702300_0_B812]Insignificant insects, [id 702300_0_B813]be incinerated to ash!

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 1
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 9
voiceLines.subtitle: Welcome. In this place, you are rewarded for your achievement and merit on the battlefield. Now, just what have you achieved?

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 2
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 10
voiceLines.subtitle: Hard work should be rewarded, and loyalty should be met with gratitude. Yes... That is only natural. I believe later generations of warriors also thought as much. And so, you too shall be rewarded.

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 3
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 11
voiceLines.subtitle: It seems you have slaughtered a lot of oni. Oh my, how diligent you are! Fufufu, you remind me of Kintoki and the others... You, I know you will turn into a fine warrior.

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 4
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 12
voiceLines.subtitle: Understood. Here, please accept this. Fufu, please do your best out there.

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 5
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 13
voiceLines.subtitle: You have made a fine selection. I hope that it will help you achieve even greater heights. Now, let us slaughter even more oni.

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 6
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 14
voiceLines.subtitle: Here, take this. It is yours. Please use it wisely.

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 11
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 15
voiceLines.subtitle: This is the end of your battle here. However, to prepare for your next battle, make sure to take the rewards your achievements merit.

voiceLines.name: About the Shop 12
voiceLines.overwriteName: Revival: The Great Tale of Demons: Onigashima - Lite 16
voiceLines.subtitle: The fight might be over, but the battlefield remains. Come, is there any reward you haven't received?
